categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: During Darth Momin's destruction of a city, an individual, who was a human male with blonde hair, was one of two Jedi who boarded Darth Momin's superweapon and killed the physical body of the Sith Lord Darth Momin, ending his rampage. He was equipped with a blue single-bladed lightsaber, and wore typical Jedi robes.
The Jedi first appeared, albeit unidentified, in the 2018 comic Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 22.
